author: olegk
msg: Deprecated Scheme, SchemeRegistry and related classes in favor of generic Registry; connection managers to use new ConnectionSocketFactory API; rewrote default HttpRoutePlanner implementations

author: olegk
msg: Deprecated AuthSchemeRegistry and CookieSpecRegistry in favor of generic Registry

author: olegk
msg: Updated new connection managers to use SocketClientConnectionImpl instead of deprecated DefaultClientConnection

author: olegk
msg: Configuration API changes: deprecated SchemeSocketFactory and SchemeLayeredSocketFactory in favor of ConnectionSocketFactory and LayeredConnectionSocketFactory interfaces (new API no longer relies on HttpParams)
